review: Not at all friendly. Don't visit to this doctor. He doesn't explain the problem.  He will just listen and write the prescription.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Today I have visited this doctor for my son who is suffering with cold from last two weeks. I never seen this kind of doctor in my life who is not even responding first 5 mins of time since he was busy on phone. he didn't even open his mouth after details explained about my son illness. He just written relent  and azythromycin syrups which I was for my son from last one week. I have told the same to the doctor but he again said use this medicine and come back after 3 days. this is the word which he opened in the end.Paying 700 as consultation fee *** ********* **** * ***** ******* Apolo clinic should think on it.
Was very patient in listening to he problem and also in explaining the solution.  Highly experienced as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We regularly visit him for kids vaccination and we are very comfortable with Dr. Mithilesh, very friendly and prescribes medicines only if needed for kids.  Thanks sir.
